description: Blend of cube +â€Ž octahedron, reflecting the fact that it can be regarded both as a rectified cube and a rectified octahedron.

entries.meaning: (geometry) An Archimedean solid that has fourteen faces (eight triangular and six square) and is both isogonal and isotoxal.
examples: In the case of perfect, symmetric L10 cuboctahedra, two of the (001)-surfaces have to be terminated completely with either iron or platinum.
